item.title: Adapt - Adapt Desktop Agent Issue
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Outage Impacting Adapt Desktop Agent (ADA)

The Bullhorn Technical Operations team is investigating an issue where the Adapt application will not be able to open or edit documents and send emails via Outlook. A fix is being implemented to address the issue.

Mar 11, 04:55 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Mar 11, 04:38 EDT
Investigating -
Impact: Adapt application will not be able to open or edit document and sending email from Adapt via outlook.
System: Adapt
Cluster(s): All
Service: Adapt Desktop Agent (ADA)
Description: The Bullhorn Technical Operations team is investigating this issue, further updates will be posted here when available.

item.title: ADA Issues - Adapt
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Adapt Application and Email Outage Summary: The Bullhorn Technical Operations team is investigating an issue causing the Adapt application to be unable to open or edit documents and send emails via Outlook. This indicates a major outage impacting system functionality.

Mar 10, 21:35 EDT
Investigating -
Impact: Adapt application will not be able to open or edit document and sending email from Adapt via outlook.
System: Adapt
Cluster(s): All
Service: Adapt Desktop Agent (ADA)
Description: The Bullhorn Technical Operations team is investigating this issue, further updates will be posted here when available.

item.title: OTE I-9 Signing Error
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Issue with eSigning I9 Section 2 in Onboarding Talent Edition

The Bullhorn engineering team is currently investigating a critical issue with the ability to eSign I9 Section 2 in the Onboarding Talent Edition application, causing significant service disruption.

Feb 27, 16:44 EST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 27, 16:29 EST
Investigating - Impact: We are currently experiencing an issue around the ability to eSign I9 Section 2 while using the Onboarding Talent Edition application. The Bullhorn engineering team is currently investigating the issue.

item.title: Event Delays - Bullhorn ATS/CRM
item.content:encoded:
Feb 22, 18:56 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 21, 17:41 EST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 21, 17:35 EST
Investigating -
Impact: Some users may experience delays when searching for newly added or recently modified records in the Bullhorn application. Additionally, some API integrations may experience delays receiving events from the Bullhorn application.
System: Bullhorn ATS/CRM
Cluster(s): CLS66
Service: Data Events
Description: The Bullhorn Technical Operations team is investigating this issue, further updates will be posted here when available.
